mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT a1.issue_id FROM ( SELECT a.issue_id FROM (SELECT adl.issue_id, adl.new_value, MAX(adl.log_id) FROM agile_data_log adl WHERE adl.field = 'Sprint' AND adl.creation_date <= #{sprintDO.startDate} GROUP BY adl.issue_id) a WHERE FIND_IN_SET(#{sprintDO.sprintId}, a.new_value)
) a1 WHERE a1.issue_id NOT IN (SELECT aisr.issue_id FROM agile_issue_sprint_rel aisr WHERE aisr.sprint_id = #{sprintDO.sprintId} AND aisr.creation_date <= #{sprintDO.startDate}) UNION ALL SELECT aisr2.issue_id FROM agile_issue_sprint_rel aisr2 WHERE aisr2.creation_date <= #{sprintDO.startDate} AND aisr2.sprint_id = #{sprintDO.sprintId} UNION ALL SELECT aaa.issue_id FROM ( SELECT adl2.issue_id FROM agile_data_log adl2 WHERE adl2.field = 'Sprint' AND adl2.creation_date > #{sprintDO.startDate} AND adl2.creation_date <= #{sprintDO.actualEndDate} AND FIND_IN_SET(#{sprintDO.sprintId}, adl2.old_value) AND !FIND_IN_SET(#{sprintDO.sprintId}, adl2.new_value) ORDER BY adl2.creation_date ASC) aaa) cd GROUP BY cd.issue_id

SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT a1.issue_id FROM ( SELECT a.issue_id FROM (SELECT adl1.issue_id, adl1.new_value FROM (SELECT adl.issue_id, adl.new_value, MAX(adl.log_id) FROM agile_data_log adl WHERE adl.field = 'Sprint' AND adl.creation_date <= #{sprintDO.startDate} GROUP BY adl.issue_id) a WHERE FIND_IN_SET(#{sprintDO.sprintId}, a.new_value)
) a1 WHERE a1.issue_id NOT IN (SELECT aisr.issue_id FROM agile_issue_sprint_rel aisr WHERE aisr.sprint_id = #{sprintDO.sprintId} AND aisr.creation_date <= #{sprintDO.startDate}) UNION ALL SELECT aisr2.issue_id FROM agile_issue_sprint_rel aisr2 WHERE aisr2.creation_date <= #{sprintDO.startDate} AND aisr2.sprint_id = #{sprintDO.sprintId} UNION ALL SELECT aaa.issue_id FROM ( SELECT adl2.issue_id FROM agile_data_log adl2 WHERE adl2.field = 'Sprint' AND adl2.creation_date > #{sprintDO.startDate} AND adl2.creation_date <= #{sprintDO.actualEndDate} AND FIND_IN_SET(#{sprintDO.sprintId}, adl2.old_value) AND !FIND_IN_SET(#{sprintDO.sprintId}, adl2.new_value) ORDER BY adl2.creation_date ASC) aaa) cd GROUP BY cd.issue_id) ddd WHERE ddd.issue_id NOT IN (SELECT aisr.issue_id FROM agile_issue_sprint_rel aisr WHERE aisr.sprint_id = #{sprintDO.sprintId})
SELECT aisr.issue_id FROM agile_issue_sprint_rel aisr WHERE aisr.sprint_id = #{sprintId}

SELECT adl.issue_id, adl.creation_date AS date, 'removeDuringSprint' as type, 1 as old_value, 0 as new_value, CONCAT_WS('-', api.project_code, ai.issue_num) AS issue_num, CONCAT_WS('-', api2.project_code, ai2.issue_num) AS parent_issue_num, ai2.issue_id as parent_issue_id, 1 as statistical FROM agile_data_log adl left join agile_issue ai on adl.issue_id = ai.issue_id LEFT JOIN agile_project_info api ON api.project_id = ai.project_id left join agile_issue ai2 on ai.parent_issue_id = ai2.issue_id LEFT JOIN agile_project_info api2 ON api2.project_id = ai2.project_id WHERE adl.field = 'Sprint' AND adl.creation_date > #{sprintDO.startDate} AND adl.creation_date <= #{sprintDO.actualEndDate} AND FIND_IN_SET(#{sprintDO.sprintId},adl.old_value) AND adl.issue_id IN
#{issueId}

SELECT adl.issue_id, adl.creation_date AS date, 'addDoneDuringSprint' as type, 1 as old_value, 0 as new_value, CONCAT_WS('-', api.project_code, ai.issue_num) AS issue_num, CONCAT_WS('-', api2.project_code, ai2.issue_num) AS parent_issue_num, ai2.issue_id as parent_issue_id, 1 as statistical FROM agile_data_log adl left join agile_issue ai on adl.issue_id = ai.issue_id LEFT JOIN agile_project_info api ON api.project_id = ai.project_id left join agile_issue ai2 on ai.parent_issue_id = ai2.issue_id LEFT JOIN agile_project_info api2 ON api2.project_id = ai2.project_id WHERE adl.field = 'resolution' AND adl.creation_date >= #{sprintDO.startDate} AND adl.creation_date <= #{sprintDO.actualEndDate} AND adl.old_value = '' AND adl.issue_id IN
#{issueId}

SELECT adl.issue_id, adl.creation_date AS date, 'removeDoneDuringSprint' as type, 0 as old_value, 1 as new_value, CONCAT_WS('-', api.project_code, ai.issue_num) AS issue_num, CONCAT_WS('-', api2.project_code, ai2.issue_num) AS parent_issue_num, ai2.issue_id as parent_issue_id, 1 as statistical FROM agile_data_log adl left join agile_issue ai on adl.issue_id = ai.issue_id LEFT JOIN agile_project_info api ON api.project_id = ai.project_id left join agile_issue ai2 on ai.parent_issue_id = ai2.issue_id LEFT JOIN agile_project_info api2 ON api2.project_id = ai2.project_id WHERE adl.field = 'resolution' AND adl.creation_date >= #{sprintDO.startDate} AND adl.creation_date <= #{sprintDO.actualEndDate} and adl.new_value = '' AND adl.issue_id IN
#{issueId}

SELECT adl.issue_id, adl.creation_date AS date, ifnull(adl.old_string,0) as old_value, ifnull(adl.new_string,0) as new_value, 'valueChange' AS type, CONCAT_WS('-', api.project_code, ai.issue_num) AS issue_num, CONCAT_WS('-', api2.project_code, ai2.issue_num) AS parent_issue_num, ai2.issue_id as parent_issue_id, 1 as statistical FROM agile_data_log adl left join agile_issue ai on adl.issue_id = ai.issue_id LEFT JOIN agile_project_info api ON api.project_id = ai.project_id left join agile_issue ai2 on ai.parent_issue_id = ai2.issue_id LEFT JOIN agile_project_info api2 ON api2.project_id = ai2.project_id WHERE adl.field = 'Story Points' AND adl.creation_date > #{sprintDO.startDate} AND adl.creation_date < #{sprintDO.actualEndDate} AND adl.issue_id IN
#{issueId}

SELECT ai.issue_id, #{sprintDO.startDate} AS date, 'startSprint' as type, 0 as old_value, 1 as new_value, CONCAT_WS('-', api.project_code, ai.issue_num) AS issue_num, CONCAT_WS('-', api2.project_code, ai2.issue_num) AS parent_issue_num, ai2.issue_id AS parent_issue_id, 1 as statistical FROM agile_issue ai LEFT JOIN agile_project_info api ON api.project_id = ai.project_id LEFT JOIN agile_issue ai2 on ai.parent_issue_id = ai2.issue_id LEFT JOIN agile_project_info api2 ON api2.project_id = ai2.project_id WHERE ai.issue_id IN
#{issueId}

SELECT c.*, CONCAT_WS('-', api.project_code, ai.issue_num) AS issue_num, CONCAT_WS('-', api2.project_code, ai2.issue_num) AS parent_issue_num, ai2.issue_id AS parent_issue_id, 'endSprint' AS type FROM ( SELECT aspr.issue_id, IF (adl.new_value IS NULL, 1, 0) AS statistical, IF (adl.new_value IS NULL, 0, 1) AS old_value, IF (adl.new_value IS NULL, 1, 0) AS new_value, #{sprintDO.actualEndDate} AS date, MAX(adl.log_id) FROM agile_issue_sprint_rel aspr LEFT JOIN agile_data_log adl ON aspr.issue_id = adl.issue_id AND adl.field = 'resolution' AND adl.creation_date < #{sprintDO.actualEndDate} WHERE aspr.sprint_id = #{sprintDO.sprintId} GROUP BY adl.issue_id ) c LEFT JOIN agile_issue ai ON c.issue_id = ai.issue_id LEFT JOIN agile_project_info api ON api.project_id = ai.project_id LEFT JOIN agile_issue ai2 ON ai.parent_issue_id = ai2.issue_id LEFT JOIN agile_project_info api2 ON api2.project_id = ai2.project_id

SELECT c.*, CONCAT_WS('-', api.project_code, ai.issue_num) AS issue_num, CONCAT_WS('-', api2.project_code, ai2.issue_num) AS parent_issue_num, ai2.issue_id AS parent_issue_id, 'endSprint' AS type, IF (d.new_value IS NULL, 1, 0) AS statistical FROM ( SELECT aspr.issue_id, IFNULL(adl.new_string, 0) AS new_value, 0 AS old_value, MAX(adl.log_id), #{sprintDO.actualEndDate} AS date FROM agile_issue_sprint_rel aspr LEFT JOIN agile_data_log adl ON aspr.issue_id = adl.issue_id AND adl.field = #{field} AND adl.creation_date < #{sprintDO.actualEndDate} WHERE aspr.sprint_id = #{sprintDO.sprintId} GROUP BY adl.issue_id ) c LEFT JOIN ( SELECT aspr1.issue_id, adl1.new_value, MAX(adl1.log_id) FROM agile_issue_sprint_rel aspr1 LEFT JOIN agile_data_log adl1 ON aspr1.issue_id = adl1.issue_id AND adl1.field = 'resolution' AND adl1.creation_date < #{sprintDO.actualEndDate} WHERE aspr1.sprint_id = #{sprintDO.sprintId} GROUP BY adl1.issue_id ) d ON c.issue_id = d.issue_id LEFT JOIN agile_issue ai ON c.issue_id = ai.issue_id LEFT JOIN agile_project_info api ON api.project_id = ai.project_id LEFT JOIN agile_issue ai2 ON ai.parent_issue_id = ai2.issue_id LEFT JOIN agile_project_info api2 ON api2.project_id = ai2.project_id

SELECT f.a FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN a.statistical = 1 AND FIND_IN_SET(#{sprintId}, b.new_value) THEN 1 WHEN a.statistical = 1 AND b.new_value IS NULL THEN 1 WHEN a.statistical = 1 AND b.new_value = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS a, count(1) FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN bbb.new_value IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS statistical, count(1) FROM ( SELECT adl1.issue_id, adl1.new_value, MAX(adl1.log_Id) FROM agile_data_log adl1 WHERE adl1.field = 'resolution' AND adl1.creation_date <= #{date} AND adl1.issue_id = #{issueId} GROUP BY adl1.issue_id ) bbb ) a, ( SELECT adl.issue_id, adl.new_value, MAX(adl.log_id) FROM agile_data_log adl WHERE adl.field = 'Sprint' AND adl.creation_date <= #{date} AND adl.issue_id = #{issueId} GROUP BY adl.issue_id ) b ) f

SELECT adl.issue_id, adl.creation_date AS date, ifnull(adl.old_string,0) as old_value, ifnull(adl.new_string,0) as new_value, 'valueChange' AS type, CONCAT_WS('-', api.project_code, ai.issue_num) AS issue_num, CONCAT_WS('-', api2.project_code, ai2.issue_num) AS parent_issue_num, ai2.issue_id as parent_issue_id, 1 as statistical FROM agile_data_log adl left join agile_issue ai on adl.issue_id = ai.issue_id LEFT JOIN agile_project_info api ON api.project_id = ai.project_id left join agile_issue ai2 on ai.parent_issue_id = ai2.issue_id LEFT JOIN agile_project_info api2 ON api2.project_id = ai2.project_id WHERE (adl.field = 'timeestimate' or adl.field = 'timespent') AND adl.creation_date > #{sprintDO.startDate} AND adl.creation_date < #{sprintDO.actualEndDate} AND adl.issue_id IN
#{issueId}

SELECT ai.issue_id, CONCAT_WS('-', api.project_code, ai.issue_num) AS issue_num, ai.type_code, ai.status_id, ais.name AS status_name, ais.category_code AS status_code, ai.summary, ai.priority_code, alv.name AS priority_name, ai.assignee_id, ai.project_id FROM agile_issue ai LEFT JOIN agile_project_info api ON ai.project_id = api.project_id LEFT JOIN agile_lookup_value alv ON ai.priority_code = alv.value_code , agile_issue_status ais WHERE ai.project_id = #{projectId} AND ai.status_id = ais.id AND ai.issue_id IN
#{issueId}
SELECT IFNULL(new_string, 0), MAX(log_id) FROM agile_data_log WHERE issue_id = #{issueId} AND field = #{field} AND creation_date <= #{date} GROUP BY issue_id
